description.english: 1st Level British Campaign Medal: The Medal of Victory is awarded to those serving in His Majesty's armed forces who have distinguished themselves in times of war while under fire by the enemies of the crown.

2nd Level British Campaign Medal: The Order for Merit is a decoration awarded for military, economic, or substantial contributions to philanthropy, the arts or sciences. Individuals such as this are the backbone of the Empire and should honored as such by His Majesty.

3rd Level British Campaign Medal: The Distinguished Service Order is a military decoration awarded to military commanders providing exceptional or meritorious service to His Majesty's Armed Forces during times of war while under fire by the enemy.

4th Level British Campaign Medal: The Knight's Cross is awarded to military commanders who successfully complete their mission against superior enemy numbers and difficult odds while serving His Majesty's armed forces during times of war.

5th Level British Campaign Medal: The Royal White Cross is a military decoration awarded to commissioned officers of captain and below who exhibit extreme courage and military proficiency in the face of the enemy while serving His Majesty's armed forces during time of war.

6th Level British Campaign Medal: The Grand Knight Cross is awarded to those individuals who provide significant service managing His Majesty's overseas territories, enlarging and enhancing territories in remote lands, bringing British Order to the furthest corners of the globe.

7th Level British Campaign Medal: The Royal Red Cross is awarded to those individuals who have exhibited exceptional care of badly wounded soldiers in a combat environment over an extended period of time and whose ministrations eased the suffering of countless souls.

8th Level British Campaign Medal: The Star of Victory is awarded to commanding officers who have rendered significant service in overseas territories to the British Empire and who have brought honor and glory to his majesty, the King.

9th Level British Campaign Medal (Hard difficulty only): The Star of Victory is awarded to commanding officers who have rendered significant service in overseas territories to the British Empire and who have brought honor and glory to his majesty, the King.

10th Level British Campaign Medal (Hard difficulty only): The Order of the Bath is awarded to commanding officers providing significant victories or eminent service during war that their names may be delivered down to posterity, accompanied by the marks of distinction which they have so nobly earned.

1st Level US Campaign Medal: By order of the Continental Congress, this medal is awarded to ordinary soldiers of the Continental Army who have distinguished themselves in the face of the enemy, placing their life at risk. It is men like this on whom our new nation shall be built.

2nd Level US Campaign Medal: This medal is awarded to ordinary seamen serving in the Continental Navy who have distinguished themselves in the face of the enemy, placing their life at risk. It is men like this on whom our new nation shall be built.

displayName.english: Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal

description.english: 3rd Level US Campaign Medal: The Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal is awarded to sailors or marines who have made outstanding achievements or provided meritorious service that reflects honorably upon the Navy.

4th Level US Campaign Medal: The Navy Combat Action Medal is awarded to members of the sea service who have actively participated in ground or surface actions with honor to the Colonies and to the satisfaction of the Navy.

5th Level US Campaign Medal: The Navy and Marine Corps Medal is awarded to members of the sea service who have heroically risked their own lives in non-combat conditions to protect their ship or shipmates from harm in a manner that brings honor to the Colonies.

6th Level US Campaign Medal: The Defense Distinguished Service Medal is awarded to those individuals who have performed exceptionally distinguished service in the defense of the national security of the Colonies.

7th Level US Campaign Medal: The Navy Distinguished Service Medal is awarded to officers serving in a duty or position of great responsibility to recognize distinguished or exceptionally meritorious service to the Navy in the performance of their duty to the Colonies.

8th Level US Campaign Medal: The Navy Commendation Cross is awarded to mid-level officers whose personal actions in the face of enemy combat exemplifies the Navy's traditions of bravery and self-sacrifice of its officers.

9th Level US Campaign Medal (Hard difficulty only): The Navy and Marine Corps Star is awarded to sea service members who exhibit outstanding gallantry while engaged with forces hostile to the Colonies at great personal risk to their own safety in the performance of their mission.

10th Level US Campaign Medal (Hard difficulty only): The Navy Cross is the highest award the Navy can bestow upon members of the sea services, and awarded to individuals who exhibit extraordinary heroism in the performance of their duties in action against enemies hostile to the Colonies.

After your heroic victories and the impressive actions against the pirates, the rulers of all Barbary States have dragged to the negotiations table under your terms. The Barbary piracy scourge is over and the sea trade is secured. Your achievement as the Barbary States Conqueror will echo in eternity your gallantry and your valuable services to the nation!
